org.jetel.component.partition

Class PartitionTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.AbstractTransformTL
      • org.jetel.component.partition.PartitionTL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PartitionFunction, Transform

    public class PartitionTL
extends AbstractTransformTL
implements PartitionFunction
    Class for executing partition function written in CloverETL language

    Nov 30, 2006
